Title: Requires OPWDD to purchase and provide essential PPE to all mental health providers in the event of a declaration of a state emergency that relates to public health
Summary: Requires OPWDD to purchase and provide essential personal protection equipment to all direct support professionals, care recipients and group home providers in the event of a declaration of a state emergency that relates to public health.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to purchase and provide essential personal protection equipment to all direct support professionals, care recipients and group home providers in the event of a declaration of a state emergency that relates to public health
